author: GSnoodePlannen
post_text: July 4, 2019 at 3:26 AM#1I've got a question about Macro/DMX Profiles. Recently I started using a macro to assign DMX Profiles to Channels:Assign Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM"Now I would like to use a macro to remove the DMX Profile from the channel, but I don't know how...Delete Profile ("X") At Channel X Attribute "DIM" seems to delete the profile completly instead of removing it from the channel.Also, at the end of a show/tour, I've used several DMX Profiles, and would like to use a macro like: Delete Profile 1 Thru At Channel 1 Thru Attribute "DIM".It feels like its a very simple/basic syntax I'm missing, I just can't find it. Thanks in advance
title: Delete DMX Profiles from Channels
